meanings.definition: In a manner that goes in two directions.
meanings.sent1: The information flowed bidirectionally between the two devices.
meanings.sent2: The road allows traffic to move bidirectionally.
meanings.sent3: The two friends communicated bidirectionally through hand signals.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed bidirectionally, splitting into two streams.
meanings.sent5: The elevator moved bidirectionally, both up and down.

meanings.definition: Capable of transmitting data in two directions simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The bidirectionally connected devices exchanged data seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The new router has bidirectionally enabled features.
meanings.sent3: The bidirectionally linked computers chatted back and forth.
meanings.sent4: The bidirectionally functioning system was highly efficient.
meanings.sent5: The bidirectionally capable software processed inputs from both sides.
